text: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe ānāpānassatibhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti
edit: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe ānāpānassatibhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti

translations.transtext: Monks, there are monks in this group, [who] live, engaging in the development of mindfulness of breathing.
